verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
// Blessed are You, Adonai,
King of the Universe -
Who has kept us
in life
and has preserved us
and enabled us
To reach this time //
To reach this time
To reach this day

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
A new day in my life
A day to worship Adonai,
A time of blessing,
A time of joy,
A time of love!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blessed are You, El Shadai
The awesome God
He was and He is
and He shall come
and every knee shall bow
and every tongue confess
that He is The Lord
